title: Argyll Hotel Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Gourmet, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. They offer a daily vegetarian appetizer and entrée, as well as a daily vegan appetizer and entrée. This is a really elegant place, and worth it for a delicious meal where you can trust that vegetarian is vegetarian and vegan is vegan.
streetAddress: On the harbour (Near ferry landing, Argyll)
